src:
Galeri Foto
Awali Hari Jum'at dengan Pisang Goreng Klasik dan Kopi Hangat Ini
07 Nov 2019, 22:30 by instagram - detikFood
Jakarta - Meski sederhana pisang goreng klasik memang berjodoh dengan kopi hitam atau kopi susu. Beragam pisang goreng klasik ini mana favoritmu?


Pisang goreng gaya Thailand ini dibalut adonanl tepung renyah lalu dilapisi gula karamel dan wijen. Kebayang gurih manisnya kan? Foto : Instagram @ moochanita



Pisang goreng tanduk diiris serong tebal dan digoreng dengan lapisan adonan tepung. Makin mantap dimakan hangat. Foto : Instagram @yennywu84



Namanya limpang-limpung dalam bahasa Jawa. Irisan pisang diaduk dengan adonan tepung lalu digoreng kering. Siapa mau ?Foto :Instagram @numpangsaveresep.id



Gaya pisang goreng kipas ini juga tak kalah enak. Pisang kepok dikerat membujur lalu dilapisi adonan tepung. Dijamin puas makannya. Foto : Instagram @ brigittawang_



Irisan pisang yang besar dan tebal juga enak dibalut tepung dan digoreng kering. Gurih manis dan sedikit asam. Nyam! Foto : Instagram @ tastyprahok



Pisang garoho khas Gorontalo diris panjang tipis dan digoreng. Kriuk renyah bikin ngopi pagi makin nikmat. Foto : Instagram @yscooking



Siapa mau? Pisang goreng keju dan cokelat yang renyah manis gurih ini?Â  Foto : Instagram @yantiliaw



Pisang goreng pasir gaya Pontianak. Irisan pisang dibuka kayak kipas lalu dilapisi adonan keriting renyah. Nyam! Foto : Instagram @ 1lcfoods3



Pisang goreng cocol sambal? Pastinya gurih pedas. Apalagi lapisan tepungnya keriting renyah. Foto : Instagram @acinlie



Bertabur keju parut pisang goreng hangat makin nikmat sebagai pengiring kopi hangat di pagi hari. Foto : Instagram @ linatosta99
text:
Photo Gallery
Start Friday with this Classic Fried Banana and Warm Coffee
Nov 7 2019, 22:30 by instagram - detikFood
Jakarta - Although a simple classic fried banana is indeed paired with black coffee or milk coffee. What is your favorite variety of fried bananas?


This Thai style fried banana is wrapped in crispy flour dough and then coated with caramelized sugar and sesame. Can you imagine the sweet taste? Photo: Instagram @ moochanita



Banana fried horn sliced thick oblique and fried with a layer of flour mixture. The more delicious eaten warm. Photo: Instagram @ yennywu84



It's called limpung in Javanese. Banana slices are stirred with flour mixture and then fried dry. Who wants? Photo: Instagram @ numpangsaveresep.id



This fried banana style fan is equally tasty. Kepok bananas are cut longitudinally and then coated with flour dough. Guaranteed to eat. Photo: Instagram @ brigittawang_



Large and thick banana slices are also delicious wrapped in flour and fried dry. Savory sweet and slightly sour. Nyam! Photo: Instagram @ tastyprahok



Garoho banana typical of Gorontalo has long thin and fried. Crispy crunchy make morning coffee more delicious. Photo: Instagram @yscooking



Who wants? This savory sweet cheese-fried banana and chocolate crispy? Photo: Instagram @yantiliaw



Pontianak style fried bananas sand. Banana slices are opened like a fan and then covered with crispy curly dough. Nyam! Photo: Instagram @ 1lcfoods3



Fried banana with chili sauce? Definitely savory spicy. Moreover, the crispy curly flour layer. Photo: Instagram @ acinlie



Sprinkled with warm fried banana grated cheese more delicious as a warm coffee accompaniment in the morning. Photo: Instagram @ linatosta99
